nav.div: Hayward Community School District » Parents » COVID-19 Resources

img.title: COVID - 19 Resources
img.style: vertical-align: top; border-width: 5px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); left: 197px; top: 227px; width: 503px; height: 188px;

br.span:
Dear Hayward Community School District Families,
First and foremost I hope all of you are safe and healthy. The purpose of my email today is to provide you with factual, accurate information regarding the Hayward Community School District and our plans for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Please click here for the April 20th update.

a.title: Primary Parent Homework Packet Pickup Letter.pdf

a.title: Press Release_ Gov. Evers Directs DHS to Extend Wisconsin's Safer at Home Order.pdf

br.a: Press Release_ Gov. Evers Directs DHS to Extend Wisconsin's Safer at Home Order.pdf

p.span: The Hayward Community School District will be open Monday, March 16th and Tuesday, March 17th. We will be closed starting Wednesday, March 18th. Please look for more detailed information in the coming days. Thank you.
